future.title: Industrial Design Master
future.text: I want to continue with Industrial Design by following the Research, Design and Development (RDD) Track as I am most interested in continuing at a professional design firm or start-up, like byFlow or Bureau Moeilijke Dingen. I want to gain more experience in creating physical prototypes with rich interaction so that I will be better prepared for my professional career.

future.title: Focus on Hardware and Physical Interactive Products
future.text: During my master and coming projects, I want to focus more on creating physical devices and prototypes that focus on the interaction experience. I want to provide smart functionality by creating software and hardware solution to add value to the design, but keep the main design focus on rich interaction and the value the design provides.
